name: Asteroid Hideout
description: Similar to a classic asteroids game you pilot a spaceship through an asteroid belt, but additionally fight waves of enemies. Every hit gives you some score and increases your score multiplier. Go for the highscore! Progress by unlocking more ships and applying upgrades and dive into higher difficulties!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
